Description: Depth at which ARMS units were deployed
Satellite-derived sea surface chlorophyll A, averaged over deployment years
Satellite-derived sea surface temparature, averaged over deployment years
Bathymetric slope index, defined as the average horizontal distance from shore to the 50 m isobath

Satellite-derived coral cover. Defined as the number of pixels with more than 10% cover in IKONOS satellite imagery covering the 0--30 m depth range. Expressed as a percentage of the total number of pixels analyzed
Incoming centrality metric calculated from modeled larval connectivity estimated from an oceanographic biophysical model parameterized for multiple reef species
Dimensionless measure of cumulative human impacts
